meta.name: Truck U
meta.description: As a how-to show dedicated exclusively to trucks, 4x4s and SUV's, Truck U (formally Truck Universe) finds monster-truck expert Matt Steele and master mechanic Bruno Massel involved in hands-on projects crucial to serious off-roading and truck performance. Ideal for reaching the flourishing truck, 4Ã—4, SUV, sport-compact truck and off-road audiences.
